r.s: File_Archive will let you manipulate easily the tar, gz, bz2 and zip files
r.d: This library is strongly object oriented. It makes it very easy to use, writing simple code, yet the library is very powerfull. File_Archive is made of two objects : readers and writers. Are currently implemented readers from file, directory, tar, gz, zip and bzip2 archives. You can write to file(s), send mails with files attached, or create tar, gz, zip, bzip2 archives.
r.n: + Add the makeAppendWriter function on readers to allow to append data to an existing archive
